click.description: A click action triggers a click event on the selected DOM element.

type.description:
A type action triggers a type event on the selected DOM element. Use to
simulate typing in an input field.

screenshot.description:
The screenshot action triggers a screenshot of the current state of the
application.

clip.description:
The clip area within the screenshot image. The clip area is defined
by the top-left corner (x, y) and the width and height of the clip area.

height.description:
The height of the clip area. If negative, the height is subtracted from the
viewport height.

width.description:
The width of the clip area. If negative, the width is subtracted from the
viewport width.

x.description: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the clip area

y.description: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the clip area

path.description:
The path to store the screenshot. This is the relative path used
within the screenshot folder.

selector.description: The selector of the DOM element to capture

border.description: The border style. Use any valid CSS border style.

selector.description: The selector of the DOM element to highlight

styles.description: The CSS styles to apply to the DOM element. Use any valid CSS styles.

border.description: The border style. Use any valid CSS border style.

selector.description: The selector of the DOM element to highlight

styles.description: The CSS styles to apply to the DOM element. Use any valid CSS styles.

highlight.description: Use highlight action to visually highlight a selected DOM element in the screenshot. By default, the element is highlighted with an orange border. Use any valid CSS styles to highlight the element.

text.description: A text action modifies the text value of selected DOM element.

chainer.description:
The chainer assertion to. Could be any valid Cypress chainer. The chainer is
not validated and may or may not have a value to assert.

value.description:
The value to assert. The value is optional and may not be required by the
chainer assertion.

assert.description:
The chainer assertion to wait for. This translates to a Cypress get().should().
See https://docs.cypress.io/api/commands/should

selector.description: The selector of the DOM element to wait for

timeout.description: The timeout in ms to wait for

wait.description:
A wait action waits for the given time in ms or for a given
chainer assertion.

simulate typing in an input field.

text.description: A text action modifies the text value of selected DOM element.

chainer.description:
The chainer assertion to. Could be any valid Cypress chainer. The chainer is
not validated and may or may not have a value to assert.

The value to assert. The value is optional and may not be required by the
chainer assertion.

The chainer assertion to wait for. This translates to a Cypress get().should().
See https://docs.cypress.io/api/commands/should

selector.description: The selector of the DOM element to wait for

timeout.description: The timeout in ms to wait for

chainer assertion.

actions.description:
The actions to perform in the screenshot workflow. The last action
is always a screenshot action. If no actions are defined or last actions is
not a screenshot action, a screenshot is taken of the current state of
the application.

date.description: The date to simulate when running the screenshot workflows

highlightStyle.description: The defaulft style to highlight elements. By default, an organge border of 2px width is used to highlight elements.

image.description: The name of the screenshot image as relative path

language.description: Load Cumulocity with the given language

only.description:
Run only this screenshot workflow and all other workflows that
have only setting enabled

requires.description:
Requires the shell application to have the a version in the given range.
The range must be a valid semver range. If requires is configured and shell
version does not fullfill the version requirement, the screenshot workflow
will be skipped.

settings.description: The configuration and settings of the screenshot

capture.description:
The type of capturing the screenshot. When fullPage is used,
the application is captured in its entirety from top to bottom.
Setting is ignored when screenshots are taken for a selected element.

disableTimersAndAnimations.description:
When true, prevents JavaScript timers (setTimeout, setInterval, etc)
and CSS animations from running while the screenshot is taken.

overwrite.description:
Overwrite existing screenshots. By enabling this setting, existing
screenshots might be deleted before running the screenshot workflow.

padding.description:
The padding in px used to alter the dimensions of a screenshot of an
element.

scale.description: Whether to scale the app to fit into the browser viewport.

default.description:
The time, in milliseconds, to wait until most DOM based commands are
considered timed out.

pageLoad.description:
The time, in milliseconds, to wait for the page to load. This is used
for visit actions.

screenshot.description:
The time, in milliseconds, to wait for a response from a network request.
Also applies to screenshot action.

viewportHeight.description: The height in px to use for the browser window

viewportWidth.description: The width in px to use for the browser window

shell.description:
The shell is used to dermine the version of the application used by
"requires" (optional)

tags.description: Tags allow grouping and filtering of screenshots (optional)

user.description:
The login user alias. Configure *user*_username and *user*_password env
variables to set the actual user id and password.

visit.description: The URI to visit. This typically a relative path to the baseUrl.

visitWaitSelector.description: The selector to wait for when visiting a page

date.description: The date to simulate when running the screenshot workflows

highlightStyle.description: The defaulft style to highlight elements. By default, an organge border of 2px width is used to highlight elements.

language.description: Load Cumulocity with the given language

selector.description: The selector to wait for before taking the screenshot.

timeout.description: The timeout in ms to wait for the page to load.

url.description:
The URL to visit. Currently only an URI relative to the base URL is
supported.

user.description:
The login user alias. Configure *user*_username and *user*_password env
variables to set the actual user id and password.

visitWaitSelector.description: The selector to wait for when visiting a page

baseUrl.description: The base URL used for all relative requests.

global.description: The global settings for all screenshots

capture.description:
The type of capturing the screenshot. When fullPage is used,
the application is captured in its entirety from top to bottom.
Setting is ignored when screenshots are taken for a selected element.

date.description: The date to simulate when running the screenshot workflows

disableTimersAndAnimations.description:
When true, prevents JavaScript timers (setTimeout, setInterval, etc)
and CSS animations from running while the screenshot is taken.

highlightStyle.description: The defaulft style to highlight elements. By default, an organge border of 2px width is used to highlight elements.

language.description: Load Cumulocity with the given language

padding.description:

element.

tags.description: Tags allow grouping and filtering of screenshots (optional)

default.description:

screenshot.description:

viewportHeight.description: The height in px to use for the browser window

visitWaitSelector.description: The selector to wait for when visiting a page

title.description: The title used for root group of screenshot workflows
